language.item: The name of the block should be at least 3 characters long
Please use the format "module/file/optional_parameters/", to link to a ACP3 internal page, e.g. news/details/id_1/.
This describes the name of the Templateplaceholder
The name of the template placeholder has to be unique
This module is responsible for the navbars.
Please select, in which navigation bar you want to display the page
Please select, whether you want to display to menu item or not
Please select, of which type the page should be
It is impossible to use the selected page as a superior page
The title should be at least 3 characters long
The index name can only contain letters, digits and the underscore
Please type in the target page and the module, resp. the URI you whish to link to
